description: Amendments to planning permission dated 26th January 2021 (RN:20/06861/NMA) for Amendments to planning permission dated 16 June 2017 (RN: 17/01843/FULL) for the: Continued use of 12 Stratford Place for mixed purposes comprising institutional use incorporating office, education, conference, meditation, community and faith uses; including incorporation of the site to the rear at 12a Stratford Place and amendments to the rear of the building to provide a new extension at basement, lower ground, ground and first floor levels for mixed Class B1/D1 institutional uses with ancillary residential accommodation, plant, storage, service and cycle storage spaces. Namely, to allow amendments to the rear extension including amendments to the roof profile, amendments to the east and west facing elevations, the removal of the external glass lift shaft and stair enclosure, other associated alterations and the removal of condition 14.
